磓字的基本解释

磓
duī
撞击：“五岳鼓舞而相磓。”
古通“堆”，堆聚：“垒珍珠，磓白玉。”
坠落，绳端系石使之下坠。

磓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duī］
［《廣韻》都回切，平灰，端。］
(1)撞击；冲击。
(2)堆聚。
(3)坠落；往下垂。
[②]［zhuì］
同“硾1”。
捣；击。

磓字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页835第02
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?都回切，音堆。聚石也。又以石投下也。亦作塠。　又【集韻】傳追切，音椎。義同。　又【正韻】直類切，音墜。同硾。【木華·海賦】岑嶺飛騰而反覆，五岳鼓舞而相磓。【註】波濤遞相觸激也。

磓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
磓字的起名意思

暂无。

磓
Basic explanation of words
磓
duī
Impact: "The Five Sacred Mountains are inspired by each other."
Gu Tong "heap", pile up: "Pearls, white jade."
Falling, the rope end tied the stone to make it fall.
磓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duī］
["Guangyun" are all cut back, flat gray, end. ]
(1) Impact; impact.
(2) Accumulation.
(3) Falling; sagging.
[②]［zhuì］
Same as "硾1".
Pound; hit.
磓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　磓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 835 No. 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? All cut back, sound pile. Poly stone also. Also cast a stone. Also used as 塠.　[Jiyun] Chuan and chase, tone vertebra. The same meaning.　[Zheng Yun] Straight cut, sound drop. Same as 硾. [Muhua·Haifu] The zen ridge is soaring and repetitive, and the five mountains are inspiring and reciprocal. [Note] The waves also touched each other.
磓

Nothing.
duī, zhuì
to throw (a stone)
